特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: コミュニケーション総論
授業方法:
Lecture.Seminar.Presentation.

After 15 minutes of lecture, students will apply the contents of the lecture to create an effective presentation.Students will give several presentations in English.

第1回:
The lecture handouts and other teaching materials are available on LUNA.
Introduction to the class
第3回: Prepare the first presentation in English.
第4回:
The benefits to the audience
Keep it simple 1
第5回:
Don't use point form!
Explain numbers with analogy
The principle of 1/3
第6回:
Inspiration from Twitter
Add a personal story
第10回: Above all else, keep it simple
第12回:
Throw away the notes
The use of space
Contrast
第14回: Prepare the second presentation in English.
